com.muchsoft.util.mac
Interface Java14Handler

All Known Implementing Classes:
Java14Adapter
public interface Java14Handler

This interface is a portable redeclaration of com.apple.eawt.ApplicationListener.

Version History:

2004-10-13
First public release.

Version:
2004-10-13
Author:
Thomas Much

Method Summary
 void handleAbout(java.util.EventObject event)
          If you do not wish a default about box to appear, call Java14Adapter.setHandled(event,true).

handleAbout

public void handleAbout(java.util.EventObject event)
If you do not wish a default about box to appear, call Java14Adapter.setHandled(event,true).

handleQuit

public void handleQuit(java.util.EventObject event)
